LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToRail: Industrial pusher must be placed so that: White glow - roller, stockpile or storage building, Aqua glow - roller
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceBetweenRailAndStockp: Industrial puller must be placed so that: White glow - roller, stockpile or storage building, Aqua glow - roller or stockpile
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToGrowzoneAndRai: Growing zone puller must be placed so that: White glow - growing zone, Aqua glow - roller or stockpile
LanguageData.MovingRail_MustPlaceNextToUndergroundInp: Underground roller output must be placed in range of a built Underground roller input.
